A0: Pakistan Friendship Association ( SLFPA ) in collaboration with
RelatedSentence: The Sri Lanka Pakistan Friendship Association ( SLFPA ) in collaboration with Pakistan High Commission held a felicitation dinner , last evening , to honour SLFPA 's Immediate Past President General Srilal Weerasuriya in recognition of the conferment of high civil award on him by the Government of Pakistan .

A0: Pakistan Friendship Association ( SLFPA ) in collaboration with
RelatedSentence: The Sri Lanka Pakistan Friendship Association ( SLFPA ) in collaboration with Pakistan High Commission held a felicitation dinner , last evening , to honour SLFPA 's Immediate Past President General Srilal Weerasuriya in recognition of the conferment of high civil award on him by the Government of Pakistan .

A0: The association of Gen Weerasooriya with Pakistan
RelatedSentence: The association of Gen Weerasooriya with Pakistan began in 1963 when he was enrolled as a Gentleman Cadet at the Pakistan Military Academy , and it continues to date , with the effect of fostering strong commercial and diplomatic ties between the two nations .
Project Chairperson Fathima Razk Cader made the opening remarks and invited Fazal Lafir , Secretary of SLPFA to introduce the dignitaries at the Head Table .
Project Chairperson Fathima Razk Cader made the opening remarks and invited Fazal Lafir , Secretary of SLPFA to introduce the dignitaries at the Head Table .
The President of Sri Lanka Pakistan Friendship Association , Mr Iftikhar Aziz congratulated the General on behalf of the entire membership of SLPFA on this singular achievement .

A0: The President of Sri Lanka Pakistan Friendship Association , Mr Iftikhar Aziz
RelatedSentence: He alsopresented a souvenir to General Srilal Weerasuriya as a token of remembrance .

A0: Deputy High Commissioner Ms. Amna Baloch
RelatedSentence: Pakistan 's Deputy High Commissioner Ms. Amna Baloch read out the message of felicitation on behalf of the High Commissioner of Pakistan H.E. Qasim Qureshi .
